Posts.Content: Apr 19, 2017 11:28PM DaisyMaeSeashell wrote: GYN suspected the onset which can last several years. I havent been regular for a year or two now ( could be 10bdays apart...could be 45 days apart...last 3. ays or a week). But normally my boobs hurt just before and during the first few days of my period. My breast symptoms...red spot changing from light to dark - darker when more pain, pain IN the breast (it feels like it is inside) radiating to my arm pit and maybe into my back (maybe not a pulled muscles as that has come and gone and come ). Tonight, Im so uncomfortable that I cant sleep. My chest just feels heavy and my boob just hurts. I know logically that all I can do is wait until the specialist office calls and schedules the appt, then go to the appt and wait some more. But damn the internet...I am fearful that the breast symptoms seem to match what ive read with IBC. But again...fibro...that ugly beast...
Posts.Title: Are these weird things related in symptomology? DaisyMaeSeashell DaisyMaeSeashell

Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2017 10:34AM DaisyMaeSeashell wrote: my pain also comes and goes but seems less with my menses. I am likely perimenopausal so my menses is irregular.
